name: Codle
description:
Welcome to Codle! A 3D Wordle Game about labelling packages in a factory!
It's very short so don't have high expectations.

In Codle, there are different modes to play besides the classic wordle

  • Timed Wordle (5 Minutes)
  • Only Yellow (Only tells words that exist but doesn't tell if the location is correct
  • 5 Tries (Only get 5 attempts)

You can also customize your desk by using the money earned from playing the game
